name: ZenPlayer
description: A Kivy front-end for a vlc backend audio player, based on the concept of playing folders as album containers.

name: ZenPlaylist
description: Present and manages the list of audio files which ZenPlayer will play through.

name: ZenLibrary
description: Present our music library given a root folder. Artist, Album and Track are inferred from the path i.e. Artist\Album\Track
